Package ProblemGenerators

Class Generator

java.lang.Object
ProblemGenerators.ProblemGenerator
Direct Known Subclasses:
CNFReader, PigeonHoleGenerator, RandomClauseSetGenerator, StringClauseSetGenerator
public abstract class Generator extends Object
This is the interface to the generator classes. The generator classes generate SAT-Problems from different sources.
Each generator class should provide the following static methods:
- public static help() for producing a help text
- public static ArrayList<HashMap<String,Object>> parseParameters(HashMap<String,String> parameters, Monitor errors, Monitor warnings)
- public static HashMap<String,Object> generate(HashMap<String,Object> parameters, ProblemSupervisor problemSupervisor, Monitor errors, Monitor warnings)

The parseParameters method turns parameters as strings into sequences of parameters as objects
The generate method generates a BasicClauseList and puts it as parameter "clauses" into the parameters map.
One can add a new generator class by extending the variable 'generators' and the method 'generatorClass'.
The class has only static methods"
Created by ohlbach on 09.10.2018.

    • generate

      public static BasicClauseList generate(String name, HashMap<String,Object> parameters, ProblemSupervisor problemSupervisor, Monitor errors, Monitor warnings)
      generates the clauses as BasicClauseList and puts then with key "clauses" into the parametes map.
      Parameters:
      name - the generator name
      parameters - the parameters for the generator
      problemSupervisor - for generating next clause id
      errors - for collecting error messages
      warnings - for collecting warning messages
      Returns:
      the new BasicClauseList

    • getParameters

      public static HashMap<String,String> getParameters(KVParser kvParser, String type)
      extracts the type-specific parameters from the kvParser
      Parameters:
      kvParser - contains all control parameters
      type - one of the generator types
      Returns:
      the parameters for the given type

    • generate

      public abstract boolean generate(Monitor errorMonitor, Monitor warningMonitor)
      generates a BasicClauseList
      Parameters:
      errorMonitor - for error massages
      warningMonitor - for warnings
      Returns:
      true if there was no error.
